title: Lab
description: Schema for submitting an object representing a cohesive research group.

name.title: Name
name.description: A short unique name for the lab, current convention is lower cased and hyphen delimited of PI's first and last name (e.g. john-doe).

title.title: Title
title.description: A unique name for affiliation identification, current convention is comma separated PI's first & last name and institute label. (e.g. John Doe, UNI).

items.description: A Principal Investigators of the lab

institute_label.title: Institute label
institute_label.description: An abbreviation for the institute the lab is associated with.

institute_name.title: Institute
institute_name.description: The name for the institute the lab is associated with.

address1.title: Address line 1
address1.description: The first line of the address of the lab.

address2.title: Address line 2
address2.description: The second line of the address of the lab.

city.title: City
city.description: The city of the address of the lab.

state.title: State/Province/Region
state.description: The state of the address of the lab.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country of the address of the lab.

postal_code.title: ZIP/Postal code
postal_code.description: The zip code of the address of the lab.

phone.title: Primary phone number
phone.description: The lab's primary phone number (with country code).
